Text: many thanks for the upload.  if you like it, buy the albums!!!

Hi Ridestowe,
I bought the albums and put them on Piratebay afterwards ..

I already own these on cd.  Thanks for the mp3 versions.  I'll put these straight on my mp3 player.  This has got to be one of the most underrated bands in the history of music.  I hope others get turned on to this band.  thanks !!!
